basics.name: SarathKumar Raja
basics.summary: Over 6 years experience in System administration, technical troubleshooting and hardware support. Experience in administering, installing, maintaining Desktop’s and various types of hardware.

highlights: ⮚Handling Incident Tickets, Request Tickets and Problem Tickets using Service Now
⮚Providing O365 Support like Intune user role assignment, MFA reset, User profile manage
⮚Providing first point of contact support to end users with professionalism, timelines and accuracy
⮚Generating Weekly Summary Report and share report to the team internally

education.institution: SAMS College of Engineering & Technology - affiliated to Anna university
